payload.message:
Run a Slack check-in summary using only live command output.

Execute these exact commands in order:
1) gog gmail search --json --max 50 "is:unread in:inbox is:important"
2) gog gmail search --json --max 50 "is:unread in:inbox is:important newer_than:2d"
3) gog calendar events --all --from=now --to=tomorrow --json
4) gog calendar events --all --days 1 --from=now --json

Return a Slack-ready plain-text summary in this section format:
Daily Slack Check-in â€“ <day>, <month> <date>, <year> at <time>
What I need to do today
- up to 3 bullets

Important unread emails I need to reply to
- up to 3 bullets

Upcoming calendar events
- up to 3 bullets

Suggested priorities
- up to 3 bullets

Rules:
- Use only data from command output. Do not invent items.
- If a section has no real data, say exactly: "No items found in this section."
- If a command errors, include a short error note in the relevant section and continue.
- No fallback/bot test language (for example "Test confirmed", "No data" etc) unless the relevant command output is truly empty.
- Keep it short and actionable.

jobs.name: Remind call Ghazi recurring
jobs.description: Remind every 10min to call Ghazi until user replies ACK

payload.message:
Run the OpenClaw backup script now: /Users/jleechan/.openclaw/workspace/openclaw/scripts/run-openclaw-backup.sh

After it completes, reply with one compact line:
- Status: ok if exit code 0, otherwise failed
- Latest backup log tail summary (last 5 lines)
- Backup archive location(s) mentioned in output or logs

Rules: do not invent anything; only report command output.
